name: Dice of Life (Glazzy)
description: Life sometimes feels like a roll of the dice. It may turn out to be good, moderate or even bad. The fates of Phil can be varied based on the dice of life…how will his life turn out to be? Will Phil gets a happy ending or torturous life? And where will he end up with. Team member: Sariddipat Praisonta - Writer Worapat Narueban - Writer Tanatorn Songnasiri - Coder Thanadol Werakajonsak - Artist Sound: Wind sound by YT: Nature Relax Undertow by Scott Buckey Special thanks to: Ryu, Arm, Pete, Tony, Ming, Theme, Junior and Tum
